section.title: Configure the Object Storage service
section.para: To retrieve storage-oriented events and samples, configure the Object Storage service to send notifications to the message bus.

procedure.title: To configure prerequisites
procedure.para: The Telemetry service requires access to the Object Storage service using the ResellerAdmin role. Perform these steps on the controller node.

step.para: Source the admin credentials to gain access to admin-only CLI commands.
Add the ResellerAdmin role to the service tenant and ceilometer user:

screen.userinput: openstack role add --project service --user ceilometer ResellerAdmin

procedure.title: To configure notifications
procedure.para: Perform these steps on the controller and any other nodes that run the Object Storage proxy service.

step.para: Edit the /etc/swift/proxy-server.conf file and complete the following actions:
In the [filter:keystoneauth] section, add the ResellerAdmin role:

step.programlisting: [pipeline:main] ... pipeline = authtoken cache healthcheck keystoneauth proxy-logging ceilometer proxy-server

[filter:ceilometer] ... paste.filter_factory = ceilometermiddleware.swift:filter_factory control_exchange = swift url = rabbit://openstack:RABBIT_PASS@controller:5672/ driver = messagingv2 topic = notifications log_level = WARN
step.para: Replace RABBIT_PASS with the password you chose for the openstack account in RabbitMQ.
